snippet.title: Ja-In (蛇陰) || RPG Maker Horror Game (English Translated Playthrough) || Full
snippet.description:
Machine translated playthrough of Ja-In, another game by Kona 5 (well known for games such as Akemi Tan, Pilgrim and Sukutte) made in Wolf RPG Editor in which a girl is taken to a strange, hellish place for touching herself. Yes, you read that correctly. It was an interesting experience for sure. It was also hellishly difficult, which you might not be able to tell from the video since I cut out my deaths most of the time, but it actually took me about an hour and a half to beat. Overall, though, I quite enjoyed it.

Download the game (untranslated): https://freegame-mugen.jp/adventure/game_5934.html
Translated using Translator++, which can be downloaded here: https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/translator-game-translation-tool.102706/
